1e56c7ea-8e88-4e3a-bd73-bb66bb2490cf.description: The recipient of this badge has completed a program designed for frontline supervisors to equip participants with an understanding of the necessary skills to succeed and further develop in the role. Recipients are able to problem-solve on the fly, handle conflicts involving staff, suppliers, contractors, or others, and coach direct reports to improve quality and efficiency. Additionally, the recipient is able to adapt to changing roles, such as moving from being a peer to a supervisor.

c66cfefd-ded2-4d4a-9368-213bb2171996.description: The recipient of this badge has completed the program Leading in Uncertainty: Lessons from the 2020 Pandemic. This program is designed for thoughtful undergraduate students to reflect on leadership during the Covid-19 pandemic. Participants listened to the experiences of senior leaders and their dialogue with professors, around a range of management topics. Participants synthesized their learning from these dialogues, identifying lessons and commitments for their own leadership development.
c66cfefd-ded2-4d4a-9368-213bb2171996.name: Leading in Uncertainty: Lessons from the Pandemic

Recipients develop strategies for diffusing new offerings into the market and identify actionable ways to keep an organization innovative.

Recipients learned how to harness strategies, tactics, methods, and resources to undertake transformative digital initiatives.

Participants built confidence in their ability to plan and conduct successful negotiations and implement agreements effectively.
